Name: Rendezvous
checklistText:
1. Radar - STBY
2. Computer: Catch-up
3. Circulize Orbit
4. Use computer to calculate transfer orbit burn time
   a. Set CORE 56 (Pe) to CORE 80 (Target Pe)
   b. Set CORE 57 (Ap) to CORE 81 (Target Ap)
5. Burn when CORE 83 reaches 0  and zero IVI's.
5. Burn at Apogee (CORE 73) and zero IVI's
6. Radar ON
7. (optional)Encoder - ON
8. (optional)Encoder CMD: 251, ACQ Lights ON
9. Computer - RNDZ
10. Start Computer when module loads
11. FDAI Data: COMP
12. FDAI Display: ATT
13. Align with target using FDAI
14. Translate towards target so IVI's L/R and UP/DN shows ZERO
15. Move closer by reduzing FWD/AFT IVI's towards ZERO.

If target vehicle is Agena or Augmented Target Docking Adapter (ATDA)
1. AGENA CONTROL: PWR - ON
2. AGENA CONTROL: SQUIB (2) - ON
3. AGENA CONTROL: CNTL - ON
